name: OR_CASE_NURS_NOTES
description: The OR_CASE_NURS_NOTES contains nursing notes from the case.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NURSING_NOTES
columns.description: The nursing notes for the case. Default notes are pulled from the procedure preference record.
